name: Datree
description: Datree scans, catalogs and recommends code components in the context of your stack. Locate and sync your dev stack across your entire team with a single click, and get valuable insights that allow you to choose the right code components for your projects. Gain instant access to your company’s entire development stack through GitHub or any other version control repository. We map your code components, development tools and internal know-how within your organization, giving you visibility into your tech stack. Connect directly into your Terminal, IDE, or as a Slack bot (coming soon) ensuring developers never have to leave the dev environment to benefit from our recommendation engine.
